parameters.name: producerBuilder
parameters.summary: The <see cref="T:Confluent.Kafka.DependentProducerBuilder`2" /> instance to be configured.

parameters.name: registryClient
parameters.summary:
The client to use for Schema Registry operations. The client should only be disposed
            after the producer; the serializer will use it to request schemas as messages are being
            produced.

parameters.name: registerAutomatically
parameters.summary: When to automatically register schemas that match <typeparamref name="TValue" />.

parameters.name: subjectNameBuilder
parameters.summary:
A function that determines the subject name given the topic name and a component type
            (key or value). If none is provided, the default "{topic name}-{component}" naming
            convention will be used.

parameters.name: tombstoneBehavior
parameters.summary: The behavior of the serializer on tombstone records.
